title: Ingxoxo Yangasese
tagline: Ingxoxo eziyimfihlo, ezihlakaniphile ‚Äî noma nini, noma kuphi.
call_status: Sicela wenze iseshini entsha ukuze uqale.

speech_not_supported: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ukuqaphela inkulumo akusekelwa. Sicela usebenzise i-Chrome noma i-Edge.
incognito_banner: Use-Imodi Engaziwa. Lesi sikhathi ngeke silondolozwe.
start_prompt: Sicela wenze iseshini entsha ngezansi ukuze uqale.
create_session_prompt: Sicela wenze iseshini entsha ukuze uqale.
chat_transcript_placeholder: Imilayezo izovela lapha uma iseshini isiqalile.
dashboard_intro: Khetha Xoxa noma Shayela ukuze uqale, noma uqhubeke nesikhathi sakamuva ngezansi.
hero_trial_text: Zama mahhala: imilayezo engama-50 noma imizuzu engu-5 yocingo ngaphambi kokubhalisa
signup_password_hint: Kumele okungenani kube nezinhlamvu ezi-6 futhi kuhlanganise uphawu olukhethekile olulodwa.
password_policy_alert: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe nezinhlamvu ezi-6 okungenani futhi iqukathe okungenani uphawu olulodwa olukhethekile.
password_hint: Okungenani izimpawu ezi-6 futhi kuhlanganise uphawu olukhethekile olulodwa.
trial_expired: Isikhathi sakho sokuzama sesiphelile. Sicela ubhalise ukuze uqhubeke.
trial_expired_banner: üö® Isikhathi sakho sokuzama sesiphelile. Bhalisa ukuze uqhubeke.
trial_call_limit_reached: ‚ö†Ô∏è Izikhathi zakho zocingo zokuzama ziphelile. Sicela ubhalise ukuze uqhubeke.
call_session_expired: ‚è∞ Ucingo lwakho lokuzama luphelile. Sicela ubhalise ukuze uqhubeke.
terms_intro: Siyakwamukela ku-TheraLink. Le Migomo Nemibandela ilawula ukufinyelela kwakho nokusetshenziswa kwezinsiza zethu. Ngokusebenzisa ipulatifomu yethu, uyavuma le Migomo ngokuphelele.
terms_use_text: Izinsiza zethu zihloselwe ukusetshenziswa komuntu siqu kuphela, hhayi kwezohwebo. Uyavuma ukuthi ngeke uphaze, uguqule, ukhuphe noma uphazamise ipulatifomu. Ukusebenzisa okungagunyaziwe noma imizamo yokuphazamisa ukuphepha noma ukusebenza, akuvunyelwe nhlobo.
terms_account_text: Unesibopho sokugcina imininingwane yakho yokungena iyimfihlo. Yonke imisebenzi eyenzeka ngaphansi kwe-akhawunti yakho izothathwa njengomthwalo wakho.
terms_liability_text: TheraLink inikeza ukwesekwa okusekelwe ku-AI futhi akufanele ithathe indawo yokunakekelwa kwezempilo okusemthethweni noma ukwelashwa kwengqondo. Asibophekile nganoma yiziphi izenzo, imiphumela noma izinqumo ezenziwe ngokusebenzisa izinsiza zethu.
terms_changes_text: Sigodla ilungelo lokushintsha noma ukuvuselela le Migomo noma kunini. Ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa izinsiza ngemva kwezinguquko kusho ukuthi uyavuma imigomo emisha.
terms_termination_text: Singamisa noma siqede ukufinyelela kwakho kupulatifomu uma wephula le Migomo noma usebenzisa kabi izinsiza.
terms_contact_text: Uma unemibuzo noma ukukhathazeka ngale Migomo, sicela usithumele ku support@theralink.com.
privacy_intro: Ubumfihlo bakho bubalulekile kithina. Le Nqubomgomo ichaza ukuthi siqoqa luphi ulwazi, silusebenzisa kanjani, kanye nezinyathelo esizithathayo ukuvikela idatha yakho.
privacy_collect_text: Singaqoqa imininingwane ye-akhawunti (njengokuthi igama lakho ne-imeyili), idatha yeseshini, nezibalo zokusetshenziswa. Ulwazi olubucayi olwabelana ngalo phakathi kwezeshi luzothathwa njengoluyimfihlo.
privacy_use_text: Sisebenzisa idatha eqoqiwe ukunikeza, ukugcina, nokuthuthukisa izinsiza zethu. Lokhu kuhlanganisa ukwenza kube okuhlukile kuwe, ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza kwepulatifomu, nokusekela ukuphepha.
privacy_share_text: Asithengisi noma siqashe imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu. Idatha ingabelwana kuphela nabahlinzeki bezinsiza abathembekile uma kudingekile, noma uma kudingeka ngumthetho.
privacy_protect_text: Sisebenzisa izinyathelo ezifanele zobuchwepheshe nezokuphatha ukuvikela imininingwane yakho. Nokho, akukho hlelo lwe-inthanethi olungaqinisekisa ukuphepha okuphelele.
privacy_retention_text: Sigcina ulwazi lwakho isikhathi esidingekayo kuphela ukuze kufezeke izinhloso ezichazwe kule nqubomgomo, noma njengoba kudingwa ngumthetho.
privacy_changes_text: Singabuyekeza le Nqubomgomo njalo. Uzokwaziswa ngezinguquko ezinkulu, futhi ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa ipulatifomu kusho ukuthi uyavuma.
privacy_contact_text: Ngemibuzo noma izicelo ezihlobene nobumfihlo, sicela uxhumane nathi ku support@theralink.com.
subscribe_text: Vula izikhathi ezingapheli zengxoxo nocingo ngentengo engu
